steps.title: Poke fun at their age or bad habits to give them the giggles.
steps.content: Poke fun at their age or bad habits to give them the giggles. Trying to add a touch of humor to your birthday card? Throw out a witty joke or one-liner to make your cousin laugh out loud. Studies show that humor can strengthen relationships. steps.title: Stress how blessed you feel to be related to your cousin.
steps.content: Stress how blessed you feel to be related to your cousin. Birthdays are a wonderful opportunity to celebrate your loved ones and thank God for putting them in your life. Turn to a birthday prayer or blessing to express your gratitude, or let your cousin know that youâ€™re praying for them on their special day (and every other day of the year). steps.title: Share a famous birthday quote when youâ€™re at a loss for words.
steps.content: Share a famous birthday quote when youâ€™re at a loss for words. Struggling to find the right sentiments? Get help from someone else! Choose an author, celebrity, or public figure that your cousin admires, then use their words to spread birthday cheer. Whether you opt for something funny, heartfelt, or motivational, itâ€™s sure to make them feel cared for . â€œIn my cousin, I find a second self.â€ â€”Isabel Norton â€œCousins by blood, friends by choice.â€ â€”Darlene Shaw â€œIt takes a long time to become young.â€ â€”Pablo Picasso â€œCousins are like fudge. Mostly sweet with a few nuts!â€ â€”Unknown â€œCousins are friends that will love you forever.â€ â€”Constance Richards â€œWe turn not older with years, but newer every day.â€ â€”Emily Dickinson â€œDonâ€™t just count your years, make your years count.â€ â€”George Meredith â€œThe older you get the better you get, unless you are a banana.â€ â€”Betty White â€œA cousin is a little bit of childhood that can never be lost.â€ â€”Marion C. Garretty â€œCousins are cool to see, impossible to forget and true to your heart.â€ â€”Leo Farno â€œWhatever with the past has gone, the best is always yet to come.â€ â€”Lucy Larcom â€œYou are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.â€ â€”Les Brown â€œYou donâ€™t choose your family. They are Godâ€™s gift to you, as you are to them.â€ â€”Desmond Tutu â€œWe grow neither better nor worse as we get old, but more like ourselves.â€ â€”Bernard Baruch â€œToday is the oldest you have been and the youngest you will ever be again. Make the most of it!â€ â€”Nicky Gumbel

steps.title: Mark a milestone birthday with a festive and meaningful message.
steps.content: Mark a milestone birthday with a festive and meaningful message. Whether your cousin is turning 21 or 100, recognizing their accomplishments and all the incredible memories youâ€™ve shared together is the perfect way to celebrate. Donâ€™t forget to wish them well for the upcoming decade and remind them that thereâ€™s so much more life has to offer! Live life to the fullest and cherish your youth. Happy 16th birthday, cuz! You only turn 18 once, so enjoy every second of it. Happy birthday, cuzzo! Now that youâ€™re 21, you can officially buy me a drink. Letâ€™s celebrate with a beer tonight! Congrats on your fully developed frontal cortex, cuz! Wishing you an amazing 25th birthday and all the best for the upcoming year! Youâ€™re approximately eleven thousand, one-hundred and seventy-five and a half days old. Turning 30 doesnâ€™t sound so bad anymore, right? They say life begins at 40, but it seems like youâ€™ve been living it up since you were born. I hope this upcoming year is as amazing as you! Youâ€™re not getting older, youâ€™re just leveling up! Happy 50th birthday to someone whoâ€™s funny, wise, and still wild at heartâ€”my wonderful cousin! Donâ€™t let aging bring you downâ€¦because it might be difficult to get back up. Happy 60th birthday to my favorite member of the family. Enjoy today! Youâ€™re never too old to blow out candles on a birthday cake, but we might need to keep a fire extinguisher handy this year. You are a shining example of strength, wisdom, and grace. Happy 90th birthday to someone who has touched the lives of so many with their kindness and generosity. Wishing you endless joy, health, and happiness on your 100th birthday. May today be a celebration of the incredible person youâ€™ve become. We are so lucky to know you!

steps.title: Send your cousin a belated wish if you missed the big day.
steps.content: Send your cousin a belated wish if you missed the big day. If your cousin isnâ€™t big on birthdays, add some humor to your message to lighten the mood, like saying youâ€™re running fashionably late or that youâ€™re extending their celebrations. Otherwise, give a genuine apology and promise that youâ€™ll make it up to them. Yes, I forgot your birthday. But on the bright side, I forgot your age too! Better late than never, right?
